solution_line_template: Maddie watches a total of {total_episodes}*{episode_length}=<<{total_episodes}*{episode_length}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes of the TV show during the week.

On Monday, Thursday, and Friday, she watches {monday_minutes}+{thursday_minutes}+{friday_minutes} = <<{monday_minutes}+{thursday_minutes}+{friday_minutes}={weekday_minutes}>>{weekday_minutes} minutes.
Thus, on the weekend she watches {total_minutes}-{weekday_minutes} = <<{total_minutes}-{weekday_minutes}={weekend_minutes}>>{weekend_minutes} minutes of the TV show.
